name: READY TO SHIP - Tiny Blooms Mohair Tieback & Pearl Bracelet Setgkyg
description:
This set is ready to ship and just in time for the holidays!!

Tiny Blooms Mohair tieback headband and pearl bracelet set in red -- what a perfect set for a Christmas photo!

This listing is for 3-blooms Luxury Fine Mohair.   Hand crocheted and all pearls are sewn in, not glued.  It is finished off with a pearl at the end of each tie.

Created in a smoke and pet free home.

Thank you to Caralee Case Photography & Jennifer Nace Photography for the use of her beautiful image.

categories.name: Tiny Blooms Tieback & Pearl Bracelet Set

name: GIFT CERTIFICATE
description:
Don't know what to give someone but know they love newborn photography props?  Or, you want to give a baby gift and want the expectant mama to pick it out?

Purchase one of my gift certificates in any amount listed or contact me for custom amount.  Gift card may be used to pay for shipping charges as well, or shipping charges may be included in gift card amount, or recipient can pay shipping charges directly via a Paypal invoice.

You can receive your gift certificate in the following options:
1) emailed to your personal email or attached in Facebook private message. By default, it will be emailed to you so please message me your email.

2) use USPS to mail it to you filled out - It will be printed on white cardstock.  Please click on shipping charge when ordering if you want it mailed in US or International)


Note:   FYI - items ordered by recipient may have a slight waiting period to receive items after ordering, anywhere from 1-4 weeks depending on the item(s) ordered.

Gift cards are a minimum of $20.

description:

name: Marie Osmond Porcelain Tiny Tot Dolls - American Classic Rose Bud
description:
ready to ship!!

I have been a collector of Marie Osmond Tiny Tot Dolls for many years and it's time to reduce my inventory.  So I am listing a few of these before I list on eBay.

This is an excellent condition, Marie Osmond American Classic Rose Bud Tiny Tots Doll. She is ready to ship!  Would make a great gift for a collector or child's room.


She is about 5" wide, arm to arm and sits 5" tall.  She is dressed in a beautiful red dress and a rose bud halo. She has porcelain face, legs, and arms and comes with her Certifica, te of Authenticity and doll necklaces. Original faces and hands by sculptor, Sonya Bryer numbered on the back of necks along with Marie's signature. She would be a sweet addition to any collector or child's room.
 
She is shipped loosely,  but have only been taken out original packaging and displayed ONLY.

Please ask questions after reviewing photos. She originally retailed for $40-50. 

No returns accepted.

name: Marie Osmond Porcelain Tiny Tot Dolls - Jingle & Belle Set
description:
READY TO SHIP!
I have been a collector of Marie Osmond Tiny Tot Dolls for many years and it's time to reduce my inventory.  So I am listing a few of these before I list on ebay.

This is an excellent condition set of 2, Marie Osmond Jingle & Belle Tiny Tots Dolls. They are ready to ship!  Would make a great gift for a collector or child.


They are about 4-1/2" wide, arm to arm and sit 5" tall.  They are dressed in their Christmas Outfits with Elf Booties and Santa Hats. They have porcelain hands and face, red nose and lips , adorable costumes and come with their Certificate of Authenticity and doll necklaces. Original faces and hands by sculptor, Beverly Stoehr, numbered on the back of necks. These would be a sweet addition to any collector, a boy and girl twin, or an adorable Christmas decoration.

 
They are shipped loosely,  but have only been taken out original packaging and displayed ONLY.

Please ask questions after reviewing photos. They originally retailed for $69-$79 (my memory fades me)

No returns accepted.

description:

Created with very soft merino wool or tweed. (image shown is in tweed)

You are purchasing 1 pair of pants only.

name: Newborn Stella Bonnet - Premium Merino
description:
Adorable crocheted newborn scalloped shell bonnet in soft merino wool.  Comes with silk ties, or at your request, the corded yarn ties. (see both images)

This shell stitch is the same stitch as the Kallye Earflap Hat. It's so pretty and creates a beautiful and well fitting bonnet.

Each bonnet is embellished with a flower clip of your choosing or I will choose one that coordinates. Please message me if you have something in mind you would like.

Newborn 

Please allow 4 weeks production time.

Created in a smoke and pet free home.

Post overage will be refunded.

You are purchasing 1 bonnet without flower clip.  Please choose a detachable flower clip to your order if you are buying for a girl.  Comes with the cord type ties; if you'd like braids, please message me.

The set is knit & crocheted with a soft tweed wool blend in a classic style rounded back.  The pants have an adorable waist with contrasting tie if desired.  This is the same beautiful bonnet as the regular Classic Knit Bonnet. It will come with your choice of 2 coordinating knit patches on front or a coordinating back pocket.  If you do not want knee patches, please let me know. 

NOTE:  I will offer a detachable flower clip for the Purple and Pink colors.  If you would like a flower clip with any of the others, please message me.

Created in a smoke and pet free home.

Please allow 4 weeks production time or message me to find out my real time schedule.

name: Newborn Kallye Earflap Hat & Pants Set
description:
New Kallye Earflap Shell Stitch Hat and Pants set is created with super soft merino wool!  Beautiful sari silk ribbon is used for the tieback and belt that weaves through the waistband on the pants.

Be aware that this yarn is kettle dyed which means no two skeins of yarn are exactly the same.  And the recycled sari yarn that comes from India is frayed and has variation color - which is natural for this type of ribbon.

Dusty Rose set is a different bonnet, but the pants are the same.

These pants will fit up to 8# baby.

Created in a smoke and pet free home.

description:
Adorable crocheted newborn scalloped shell bonnet in solid merino wool blend.

This shell stitch is the same stitch as the Kallye Earflap Hat. It's so pretty and creates a beautiful bonnet.

Each bonnet is embellished with a silk delphinium with pearl as shown. Flowers are based on availability. If you would like something different please message me.

Newborn 

The Stella Bonnet is crocheted with a soft merino wool blend in solid colors.  The shell stitch creates a beautiful texture to the bonnet and it has long ties that can be tied in bow or left hanging.

Please allow 4 weeks production time.

Created in a smoke and pet free home.

Beautiful image by Mandy Kay Photography and Chi Photography. Image shown is a self-striping yarn in another listing.

name: Stella Bonnet & Pants Set
description:
New crocheted Stella Bonnet and Pants Set!!

You are purchasing a newborn set that will fit approximately 6-8#.

This is an adorable newborn crocheted scalloped shell bonnet in a very soft merino wool.  The yarn is kettle-dyed so no two skeins will look exactly alike.  

The bonnet is adorned with recycled sari silk ribbon that is frayed on edges - that is the nature of the material.  The same ribbon will be woven in the bonnet with a flower clip to match your outfit.  Same ribbon will be used as a tie on the pants.

If you choose, you may have satin ribbon instead of the sari ribbon. Please message me with any requests you may have, within reason.

You also have the option to have no ribbon ties; i am happy to make long crochet cords or braids if you wish.

You will be getting pants length in this set.  If you choose, you may request capri length (below knees and a little shorter than the pants)  Please message me with this request.


Please allow 4 weeks production time but you can check with me on real time production.

NOTE:  I will refund postage overage where applicable.

Created in a smoke and pet free home.

Beautiful images by Marked With A B Photography and Mandy Kay Photography.

Pearls are 6mm in size and are not genuine pearls.  They come on a stretchy elastic for easy on/off.
